name: File (Importer)
xml:
<field
	type="files"
	name="file"
	label="File"
	description="Select relevant file option and upload file."
	class="list_class"
	layout="joomla.form.field.list-fancy-select"
	readonly="true"
	extends="list"
	table="#__###component###_file"
	component="com_###component###"
	entity="###view###"
	view="file"
	views="files"
	value_field="name"
	key_field="guid"
	prime_php="1"
	type_php_1="__.o0=base64=Oo.__"
/>
